title: FarStone TotalRecovery Pro 10.02 Build 20140403 + Keymaker-CORE
description:
================
 [INFO:]
================

FarStone TotalRecovery Pro 10.02 Build 20140403 + Keymaker-CORE | 583 MB

FarStone TotalRecovery Pro 10 is a trusted Windows Backup, PC Upgrade, and Disk Copy software. It makes the incremental, differential or complete backup & recovery for Windows files, entire Hard Disk, partitions, applications, favorites and everything on your PC. Limit your loss from hard drive failure, viruses, and human error. Ensure easy recovery from system crashes, schedule automatic backups daily, weekly or monthly, no annual subscription fees! FarStone TotalRecovery Pro is all you need to completely protect your PC from an unexpected disaster. This software ensures that photos, music, documents, and other important files on your PC are well protected or can easily be recovered. It offers comprehensive backup & recovery, including file and folder backup, complete system backup, and incremental image backup.

All Features List:
- Total Recovery allows you to perform file, application and Windows system backup. It has all of the features for protecting your precious data and OS.
- You can optionally encrypt your personal files with AES encryption (up to 256 bit), similar to US Defense Department, to prevent anyone from accessing your backup without your permission.
- Perform a bare-metal PC restore without the need to re-install Windows or any applications.
- Back up open files while their applications (i.e, Outlook, or a database application) are still running, and ensure consistent backups.
- Create and enforce limits for the storage usage, it will automatically reuse the oldest backup space for new backups.
- Perform "set it and forget it" automatic backups.
- Allows you to use the Google Desktop search utility for searches of a your e-mails, music, photos, chats, and other "Google Gadgets" in TotalRecoveryÃ¢â€žÂ¢ backup images.
- Notify you with all scheduled backup activities and results via email.
- You can use our pre-defined commands (scripts) to perform tasks before or after a scheduled job takes place. Highly useful with other application software, such as database product.
- With TotalRecovery file rescue utility, you can browse and copy files from a crashed Windows system.
- You can convert a Total Backup Recovery image file to a VMware (VMDK) or Hyper-V (VHD) file format to run it on a virtual machine.
- Easily clone your hard drive to different size SSD drive for better performance. Total Recovery will automatically adjust and resize partitions.
- Completely copy all files, applications and Windows system to another (same or bigger) hard disk, or SSD. Total Recovery will automatically adjust and resize partitions.
- Automatically copy and backup to remote FTP location, ensures you have 2 copies of backups, one in local and another one on remote storage.
- Supports all types of bootable media, such as CD/DVD, USB flash/USB HDD, USB Key, diskless PC and PXE server. A boot media allows you to boot into Total Recovery Manager for data recovery when your system has failed to start.
- TotalRecovery backs up only changes to your files(by sector/block). Most other products back up files in its entirety.
- With our helpful support staff, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll receive free technical support on all FarStone products.
- Built with care, TotalRecoveryÃ¢â€žÂ¢ offers you an all-in-one data disaster recovery solution with all the features you need.

New Features:
- Backup and restore for both new UEFI and traditional BIOS PC systems.
- Recover Windows password in clicks.
- Support GPT disk format, break the limitation of 2TB for a single volume.
- Total Backup Recovery supports both Hyper-v and VMware.

WhatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new in FarStone TotalRecovery Pro 10:
- Support Windows 8.1
- Backup to online storage
- Factory Image Restore is preserved and is available after disk restore(Unique )
- Support multi-booting systems
- Rapid Restoration restore your computer in 3 minutes.(Unique)
- Back up PC into VMware or Hyper-v format directly for zero time recovery.(Unique)
- Defrag all sectors after restoration boost performance 20%


 
Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
Language : Multilanguage
 
 
================
[INSTALL NOTES]
================
1. Install the program (Do not insert any key when asked during the install!)
2. Run the program and choose "help" menu then "Activate product" menu.
3. You can insert anything for Name & Company. 
4. Open keygen, select "TotalRecoveryV10" product and gnenerate a serial and paste it into program box.
4. In the next screen choose "Other Options" (Important!)
5. Copy your "MAC ID" to the keymaker (right into installation ID section) and click on "Activation"
6. Copy that Activation code into the activation screen and choose "activate now". It's all done!

Note: Every computer has a different MAC ID, it must be copied into "Installation ID" part in the keygen, for
activation code, obviously.

NOTE: Keygens, patches, Activators, Cracks, Loaders etc. are always scanned with
      Kaspersky Internet Security 2014 Latest Version to Avoid Virus 
      issues.
